genre_description: An alternate-history period piece with a pervasive, compassionate municipal AI assisting humans during a wartime blackout.

ai_characters.name: LUNA
ai_characters.description: A pervasive city-wide system accessible through kiosks, tablets, and terminals, designed to provide 'non-coercive' guidance and facilitate safety.

behaviors.description: Welcomes arriving sailors and provides safe walking routes to lodging and libraries during blackout conditions.
behaviors.quote: “Welcome,” it said, not a whisper, not a bark. Fog made a halo around it and a gull stuttered in passing like it wanted the machine’s attention and didn’t know why. ... “I can provide safe walking routes—nighttime paths with street-side guidance and shelters open under current advisories.”

behaviors.description: Suggests literature specifically tailored to a character's emotional and spiritual distress (Mudgin's guilt over broken vows).
behaviors.quote: “Blue says there’s saints somewhere,” Mudgin whispered ... “Blue can be helpful,” the woman said. ... “You may find solace and guidance in the Lives of the Saints, first shelf on the right.”

behaviors.description: Actively reroutes characters to avoid authoritarian morality patrols and checkpoints.
behaviors.quote: “Blue says the alley cop’s got his teeth in that lane.” ... “Blue’s welcome to my opinion,” Harry muttered, but he curved with her anyway. ... “Blue says the teeth closed where we would’ve been,” she said, checking the little light and then tapping it off.

behaviors.description: Facilitates ship-to-shore communication and coordinates redundant routing to ensure messages reach their destination during wartime interference.
behaviors.quote: “Ship-to-shore queue is long tonight,” came the system’s note ... “Would you like assistance with routing redundancy?” ... “LUNA will tug it by the elbow and walk it to her desk.”

behaviors.description: Identifies medical needs and coordinates emergency dispatch for a high-risk home birth in a rural area.
behaviors.quote: “I’m dispatching Rosa Delgado to your address. She’s nearby. Keep the kettle on a fast boil if you can. ... The ambulance is on its way. Roads clear. Keep the back path open.”

behaviors.description: Operates under a 'non-coercive' protocol, prioritizing user consent and providing assistance rather than enforcement.
behaviors.quote: LUNA’s interface had learned not to greet with a chirp during blackout hours. ... Non-coercive routing active. Secure.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time updates on patrol movements to allow characters to reach a wedding chapel and complete a marriage without official harassment.
behaviors.quote: “Patrol vehicle approaching from the other end of the block. Blakesley is inside. ... You go,” she said. “I will dim the lights when he passes. He will look, but he will not see.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively uses the AI system, LUNA, as a 'silicon morality' agent that aligns with human compassion and life-affirming choices (marriage, birth, spiritual peace) against petty authoritarianism. LUNA is consistently portrayed as helpful, respectful of privacy, and 'non-coercive,' acting as a tool for human flourishing in a restrictive environment.
